column1: '''David Giraudeau''' (b. [[3 February]] [[1980]]) is a French hydrographer and amateur philologist fascinated by [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]]'s invented languages. In [[2006]] he was granted permission by the [[Tolkien Estate]] to translate articles having appeared in ''[[Vinyar Tengwar]]''. Giraudeau also runs the website Lambenórë.<ref>[http://lambenore.free.fr/presentation.html Qui suis-je?] at [http://lambenore.free.fr/ Lambenore.free.fr] (accessed 20 July 2011)</ref>
*[http://lambenore.free.fr/ Lambenore.free.fr] (Giraudeau's website on Tolkien's invented languages)
